summary: I got this idea from the TV show Charmed.
descriptionHtml:
Version 3
Featuring:
•	The Charmed Ones
•	Many portals (mini-doors) are hidden are around for you to find!
•	All Workbenches and forge.
•	Storage area.
•	Pentagram
•	New items (not god)
•	Surprises to remind you about key moment of the show.
•	And I’m not telling it will spoil the surprise
Remember I am still learning, and it is not finished
______________
I got this idea from the TV show Charmed where they go back in time. It is my first mod.
It is incomplete, but very workable. I uploaded it to see what you think of the concept.

Inside your The Charmed Ones Cave you will find:
Prue (Doesn\'t say mutch yet)
Tanning Rack
Alchemy crafting table.
Blacksmith crafting with everything you need.
Enchanting crafting table.
Several books.
Teleporter (One in the Cave, the other on the path leading to the Solitude docks).
And a few surprises!

Planning more including fixed floors and walls, the other two sisters, and some other add-ons as I get better at this.,
author: Ben Falconer Bridges
